thread.title: Elvis Presley's ex Priscilla reportedly dating Sir Tom Jones
thread.title_full: Elvis Presley's ex Priscilla reportedly dating Sir Tom Jones

author: JESSA SCHROEDER
title: Elvis Presley's ex Priscilla reportedly dating Sir Tom Jones
text:
Elvis Presley's ex Priscilla reportedly dating Tom Jones Elvis Presley's ex Priscilla reportedly dating Tom Jones Sir Tom Jones and Priscilla Presley were spotted out together in January. (ADVA, CARV20/AKM-GSI)   12:24 PM 
Sir Tom Jones might be falling in love again. 
The Welsh singer is reportedly dating Elvis Presley's ex-wife, Priscilla, nearly a year after the passing of his wife, Melinda Trenchard, The Sun reports . 
"Tom and Priscilla are courting. There is a spark between them but they are taking it slowly. It really is early days but they get on so well," a source close to the pair told the British newspaper. 
Jones, 76, told the Sun in an interview that he and Presley, 71, have been friends for some time, and have been savoring their time together. 
Fan theory suggests Elvis had a surprise cameo in 'Home Alone' 
"She's a lovely lady. We do enjoy our nights out together," he said. 
The American actress and businesswoman married The King of Rock 'n' Roll in a 1967 Las Vegas wedding. They divorced in 1973 after several alleged affairs by both parties and the singer's reported problems with substance abuse. Priscilla married Elvis Presley in 1967, but they only remained together for six years. (Â© STR New / Reuters) 
Jones, who was married to Trenchard since 1957, remained by her side until she lost her battle with cancer in April 2016. 
Jones and Elvis were also friends who spent time together on and off the stage. Join the Conversation:
